name: Modern Fatal Commando in Top Ambush 3d
name_original: Modern Fatal Commando in Top Ambush 3d
description:
Play Your Role in Military
Suppose you are a frontline soldier of your army and with the help of assault rifle simulation, you can easily access the entry in enemy camps. You have also a major defense contract with your army to fight with enemy till last breath. Enemy army has added some gangsters and warriors which can be a big threat for your nation. In this case you have to take the Full Command of your area and clear the occupied fields. The soldiers with you are you brothers and they all are set to fight terrorist commandos. You have to take the lead role and do sharp shooting with your gun. You are provided with the most advanced weaponry that can help you in fighting.

Extreme Shooting Adventure
There is always an excitement to command and conquer the enemy areas. Take this game for xtreme adventure with different weapons and sniper rifles. Your main goal is to simulate your gun as fast as you can in order to overcome the invasion of enemy military. There is always an options to call your army helicopters and vehicles for your backup support. But wait you are in the border area and it is highly secured with extremely sharp snipers and when they spot you, it will be only a sound of a bullet and the rest is gone. In this fear, you have to hold you nerves and shoot enemy deadly commandos silently and precisely.The enemy soldiers often move in the form of squad and groups and destroy every man that comes on their way.You have to follow the instruction of your commander and survive in the different environment.

Search and Attack Terrorists
Kill and attack the real commando who is doing assault with af47 and be a US Army commando who can counter many attacks in army bases and save lives for the sake of humanity. The war is going to be extreme and you are the only lone commando equipped with murder weapons in this top game of 2017. Don’t miss the target and assassinate every army target by aiming and shooting with deep courage and don’t allow the ruthless killer to look at your nation with bad eye. Experience one of the top commando shooting games in the year of 2017 for free.

Protect Your Nation
Hold your shooter gun and shoot. Never mind to reload the gun, because you are always here to hit the trigger of Ak47. The top new game to free your country from deadly terrorists and soldiers. Advanced commando contract based missions and goals are awaiting for you. This is not just a military commando game, this game is to get more chances to achieve more different goals than all other shooting games are typical.

Unlimited Bullets to Fire
Forget about sniper contract, you are now recruited as a lethal commando for your nation and you have to perform your duty in elite 3D forces. There is also an unlimited warfare with ten action packed mission.
Feel the real thrill action of Third person shooter game and prove your skills in the this latest assassin commando game.
